name: fullstack-starter-pack
description: Complete fullstack development toolkit with 15 plugins: React components, Express/FastAPI APIs, PostgreSQL schemas, Prisma ORM, deployment automation
features: Frontend: React components, UI/UX design, Tailwind utilities
Backend: Express/FastAPI scaffolding, API design patterns
Database: Prisma schema generation, SQL query building, migrations
Integration: Authentication setup, environment config, full project scaffolding
Perfect for bootcamp grads and junior developers
